dict.acceptation: 警察部门；警方；警察；治安；
（警察、军队等）巡查；维护治安；（委员会等）监督；管制；

sent.orig: An injured Pakistani police officer lies down near tear gas thrown by police.
sent.trans: 一个受伤的巴基斯坦警察躺在警察投掷的催泪弹旁。

sent.orig: Do the students of the police school have police IDs?
Lanhanzhi intentionally let the police know, and apparently, the police are sure to know.
sent.trans: 蓝汉之是故意要警察知道，而显然警察也是一定会知道的。

sent.orig: Secret police use of points: police could finally kill!
sent.trans: 秘密警察使用要点：警察终于可以杀人了！

sent.orig: Soon the police came and brought the boy the police station.
sent.trans: 很快，警察来了并且把男孩带到了警察局。
